name: Off-road Mountain Stunts: The Real Jeep Safari
name_original: Off-road Mountain Stunts: The Real Jeep Safari
description:
Want to challenge yourself and your extreme driving skills on advance 4x4 jeeps drive on the deadly and dangerous mountainous hilly traces? Then accept the extreme offroad drive challenge in Off-road Mountain Stunts: The Real Jeep Safari. The challenge and test is not for the faint hearted drivers and gamers. This is test of patience, courage and bravery to drive these extreme off-road 4x4 jeeps in most difficult and dangerous mountainous roads you have ever experienced.
In Off-road Mountain Stunts: The Real Jeep Safari you will get the chance to drive the stylish and classic off-road vehicles with the options of 4x4 gears at your disposals to drive in hilly areas. You need to select the appropriate jeep speed, angle and gear to drive in these conditions otherwise you can fall from the mountains in steep valleys or in fast moving rivers. You can also use different amazing camera angles for supreme game and drive experience.
The wait is over for the extreme 4x4 off road drivers and download this amazing simulation called Off-road Mountain Stunts: The Real Jeep Safari. With amazing mountain location and eye catching sceneries you will get the nonstop action and adventure ride on the extreme 4x4 traces that will take your breath away!

Game Features:
1) Stunting Mountain Drive Graphics
2) Brilliant Game control and Gameplay
3) Challenging and exciting Off-road missions
4) Advance 4x4 Classic and Modern Jeeps
5) Challenge for all family and friends
